name: A Replacer
description:
You can replace the layer with a custom element, and the replaced layer will inherit the size attribute.


你可以用自定义的元素替图层，被替换的图层会继承尺寸属性。


使用方式：

选择一个元素，然后将其添加到“替换源”列表

选择需要被替换的元素，然后点击“替换源”列表中的元素。

可以在“替换源”列表中预先添加多个需要的替换元素

每个文档的“替换源”都是私有的


你可以通过将组件添加到“替换源”来将其他元素替换为该组件的实例，如果需要添加团队组件，请将组件的实例添加到文档后将该实例添加为“替换源”


Usage:


Select an element and add it to the replace source list


Select the element to be replaced, and then click the element in the "replacement source" list.


You can add multiple required replacement elements in the replacement source list in advance


The "replacement source" of each document is private


You can replace other elements with instances of the component by adding the component to the "replacement source". If you need to add a team component, please add the instance of the component to the document and add the instance as the "replacement source"
